ComicInfo.Summary:
Now that The Darkness has been shown the light by RIPCLAW, will he truly join forces with him? If Ripclaw gets his way, this could be a one of the scariest team-ups ever! With Jackie's twin sister, Capris in a family even more deadly than her other kin, the Mafia, it looks like there's trouble abound. As if the former duo weren't scary enough! One has to hope her intentions are not self-serving, as she is guarding their sprits while they battle the Conquistador. Don't miss this exciting finale of the 3 part Ripclaw story arc!
SPOILERS
While visiting the spiritworld, jackie sees the death of his father.
